briefTitle: Tamoxifen Pharmacogenetics in Asian Breast Cancer Women
officialTitle: Observational Study: Biomarker Research for Tamoxifen Pharmacogenetics Among Asian Breast Cancer Patients
conditions: Poisoning by, Adverse Effect of and Underdosing of Tamoxifen
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Association between genetic polymorphisms of CYP2D6, CYP2C19, and CYP3A5 and disease free survival among tamoxifen treated breast cancer patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* incident breast cancer patients who underwent surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* previous cancer history before breast cancer diagnosis
